summary: The document is a memorandum from 25 April 1960, detailing the processing and payment of the remaining half of Rivard G. Tichborn's salary ($650.00) for his assignment related to a Cuban trip. The payment was processed through finance and cover channels, with the check being cleared and forwarded to Tichborn's California bank via Sanford Associates in Philadelphia. This document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
key_findings: Payment of $650.00 to Rivard G. Tichborn for his Cuban trip assignment was processed and found in order.
The check was cleared and forwarded through Cover Division to Sanford Associates in Philadelphia for mailing to Tichborn's bank in California.
The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
